title: The extraordinary mystery of the Tigers' Tarik Skubal
content: "I wasn't good until I was 26," the All-Star pitcher says. How he rose from Little League lore to Cy Young.

title: Suns' Booker agrees to historic $145M extension
content: Phoenix Suns superstar Devin Booker agreed to a two-year, $145 million maximum contract extension with the franchise through the 2029-30 season, the highest annual extension salary in NBA history, CAA's Jessica Holtz and Melvin Booker told ESPN.

title: PSG trounces Madrid, Mbappé to reach CWC final
content: Fabián Ruiz scored twice and Ousmane Dembélé added a goal and an assist as Paris Saint-Germain eliminated Real Madrid and Kylian Mbappé from the FIFA Club World Cup by sailing to a 4-0 semifinal win on Wednesday.

title: MMA star Couture airlifted following racing wreck
content: Mixed martial arts legend and UFC Hall of Famer Randy Couture was airlifted to a burn center Tuesday in Kansas City with injuries stemming from a single car accident at a pro stock car racetrack, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Former Jazz coach and GM Layden dies at age 93
content: Frank Layden, who led the Jazz to their first playoff appearance and was part of the front office that selected John Stockton and Karl Malone, has died.

title: Ex-MMA star Askren on mend after lung transplant
content: Former Olympic wrestler and MMA star Ben Askren, who has been hospitalized in Wisconsin after a severe case of pneumonia, said in a post on social media Wednesday that he had undergone a double lung transplant and is in recovery.

title: Messi scores 2, makes MLS history in Miami win
content: Lionel Messi added another record to his list of career achievements as he scored a pair of goals to lead Inter Miami CF to a 2-1 win over the New England Revolution.

title: Vikes pass rusher Turner scammed out of $240K
content: Vikings outside linebacker Dallas Turner was allegedly a victim of a bank fraud scheme that resulted in the theft of $240,000.

title: New East tiers: How injuries, offseason movement reshaped the conference
content: From injured superstars to play-in teams making major splashes, Chris Herring runs down every team's outlook for 2025-26.

title: Two A's and how many F's?! Midseason grades for all 30 MLB teams
content: From the contenders acing 2025 to the first-half failures, we take a look at every club's performance.

title: Trade proposals for Paul Skenes, Ronald Acuña Jr., Byron Buxton
content: You won't see these stars available via trade this year -- but what would it take to land them if they were?

title: Assembling the U.S. Olympic flag football team: Our 10-player roster for 2028 -- and one go-to play
content: We picked nine NFL players -- and one college football star -- for the U.S. Olympic flag football roster for 2028. Who would make our team?

title: The 'unbelievable' comeback story of Belinda Bencic at Wimbledon
content: Unseeded Belinda Bencic has had an improbable tournament at Wimbledon -- just a year after giving birth.

title: Is dismissing Horner Red Bull's gamble to keep Verstappen?
content: A number of factors contributed to Christian Horner's dismissal from Red Bull, but Max Verstappen's long-term future may have been the biggest.

title: Can No. 1 Sabalenka be defeated? Amanda Anisimova may find a way
content: The Wimbledon semifinal between top-ranked Sabalenka and American Anisimova might not be as straightforward as it seems. We break it down.

title: Who are the NFL's best edge rushers? Execs, coaches and scouts help rank 2025's top 10
content: Who are the best edge rushers in the NFL? Execs, coaches and scouts ranked their top 10 in our annual summer series.

title: PSG are out of this world, as Real Madrid are brought back down to earth
content: Paris Saint-Germain will compete for the Club World Cup title against Chelsea, following a performance that left Real Madrid shellshocked.

title: All of college football ought to cheer for Texas Tech
content: The Red Raiders' signing of Felix Ojo shows the college football playing field is continuing to level.

title: Eli Manning passes on Giants stake: 'Too expensive for me'
content: After initially being interested, former Giants quarterback Eli Manning has opted not to buy an ownership stake in the team, saying "it's too expensive for me."

title: What the NCAA tournament could look like with expansion
content: How would an expanded March Madness work with 72 or 76 teams? Bracketologist Joe Lunardi tries to answer some of your questions.

title: Power Rankings: Storm up, Aces down and no time to panic for New York
content: The defending champ opened the season with nine straight wins. But it has lost six of the past nine games.

title: Club World Cup's standout players and trends, from Jobe Bellingham to Thiago Silva
content: From stifling heat to standout players, let's talk about the Club World Cup's most memorable so far in Gianni Infantino's grand, weird experiment.

title: Texas Tech's tortillas and more updates to CFB 26 are shown through team accounts
content: New traditions, presentation features and uniforms have been added to the second edition of the game.

title: Madrid ready for 'new age' after 'painful' PSG rout
content: Real Madrid will start next season from scratch, manager Xabi Alonso said, after a 4-0 defeat to Paris Saint-Germain in the Club World Cup semifinal.

title: Return of 'best player' Dembélé 'critical' for PSG
content: Paris Saint-Germain manager Luis Enrique will hope to count on striker Ousmane Dembélé for Sunday's Club World Cup finale against Chelsea, after a stunning 4-0 thrashing over Real Madrid in the tournament's penultimate stage.

title: Ancelotti gets 1-year sentence in tax fraud case
content: A Madrid court on Wednesday handed down a one-year sentence and a €386,000 ($452,000) fine to Brazil coach Carlo Ancelotti for failing to pay tax on his image rights revenues when he was Real Madrid manager in 2014, the court said in a statement.

title: Source: Tottenham agree $75M deal for Kudus
content: Tottenham Hotspur have agreed a fee of around £55 million (74.7m) to sign West Ham midfielder Mohammed Kudus, a source confirmed to ESPN's James Olley.

title: Gyökeres: Amorim's tactics 'suited me perfectly'
content: Sporting CP forward Viktor Gyökeres has said the style of play under his former coach Ruben Amorim "suited me perfectly."

title: Wrexham reveal 2025-26 home kit: Will they reach the Premier League with it?
content: Wrexham will have a fresh look when they return to English football's second tier after 43 years away.

title: 'Today's India not India of 1975': Tharoor calls Emergency 'dark chapter'; recalls Sanjay Gandhi's role
content: Shashi Tharoor's critique of the 1975 Emergency, particularly Sanjay Gandhi's sterilization campaigns, has stirred debate within the Congress party. His article in Deepika highlights the fragility of democracy and the need for vigilance against authoritarian tendencies. This comes amid existing tensions between Tharoor and the party leadership, further fueled by differing views and public statements.

title: Delhi double murder: Man sold 1st child, forced abortion of 2nd; killed wife and 3rd baby
content: Nikhil, the primary suspect in the Majnu Ka Tila double murder case, has been arrested in Haldwani, Uttarakhand. He is accused of fatally attacking his former live-in partner, Sonal, and an infant, driven by suspicions of infidelity and revenge for a past abortion. After the crime, Nikhil attempted to flee towards Nepal, but police apprehended him based on a tip-off.

title: 'Should undergo mental checkup': BJP mocks Kejriwal's 'Nobel Prize' remark
content: The BJP has strongly criticized Arvind Kejriwal's recent assertion that he deserves a Nobel Prize for governance, citing his claims of delivering despite administrative obstacles. BJP leaders like Virendra Sachdeva and Tarun Chugh have ridiculed Kejriwal's statement, pointing to allegations of corruption and inefficiency in Delhi's governance.

title: ‘There is pressure...’: Will Sena (UBT) tie up with MNS for BMC polls? Sanjay Raut responds
content: Sanjay Raut clarified that while no formal alliance exists between Shiv Sena (UBT) and MNS, public sentiment favors their collaboration for upcoming local elections, especially the BMC polls.

title: Grok 4 launched: Elon Musk claims ‘Most PhDs would fail...’
content: Elon Musk's xAI has launched Grok 4, the latest version of its AI chatbot, despite recent controversies over offensive and antisemitic remarks made by previous versions. Musk claims Grok 4 possesses PhD-level intelligence and the potential to discover new technologies and even physics. The chatbot will be available through a premium X subscription.

title: Vadodara's ‘death-bridge’: Letters warned of danger; report found it ‘unfit for use’
content: The Gambhira Bridge collapse in Vadodara, resulting in 16 fatalities, has sparked outrage as it emerges that repeated warnings about the bridge's unsafe condition were ignored. Despite local leaders' pleas and reminders following the Morbi tragedy, authorities failed to act, even after an R&B department engineer reportedly deemed the bridge unfit in 2022.

title: India-US trade deal: Indian team to visit Washington for another round of talks
content: An Indian commerce ministry team is preparing to visit Washington for further discussions with the U.S. regarding the ongoing tariff dispute and a proposed bilateral trade agreement. The talks will center on both the interim and first phase of the BTA, with the US having extended the suspension of additional duties on Indian goods until August 1.

title: 'Such good English': Trump’s compliment to Liberian President triggers criticism - watch
content: During a White House meeting, Donald Trump complimented Liberian President Joseph Boakai on his English proficiency, a remark that sparked controversy given English is Liberia's official language and Boakai's education. Critics viewed Trump's comment as condescending, while the White House defended it as a heartfelt compliment, highlighting Trump's commitment to global stability and Africa.

title: US court strikes down ‘Click-to-Cancel’ rule: Hard to cancel subscribtions
content: A US federal appeals court has struck down the FTC's 'click-to-cancel' rule, which was set to simplify subscription cancellations. The court found that the FTC failed to comply with procedural requirements during rule-making. This decision means consumers may continue to face complex cancellation processes, despite rising complaints about deceptive subscription practices.

title: After canteen assault, Sena MLA stirs new row; targets Shetty community
content: Shiv Sena MLA Sanjay Gaikwad, already under fire for assaulting a canteen worker over stale food, ignited further controversy by making disparaging remarks against the Shetty community, accusing them of corrupting Maharashtra's culture through businesses like dance bars. He defended his actions by citing concerns about youth corruption and cultural degradation, while acknowledging his violent approach was wrong.

title: Ekta Kapoor on bringing back ‘Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi’ after 25 years
content: Ekta Kapoor announced the return of Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi. The show marks 25 years since it first aired. It will return in a limited-episode format. The aim is to reignite meaningful storytelling. Smriti Irani will be at the helm. The reboot promises socially relevant storytelling with a modern lens.

title: What is Bitchat? Dorsey’s messaging app works without internet using Bluetooth
content: Jack Dorsey's Bitchat, a decentralized messaging app, enables offline communication via Bluetooth mesh networking, ensuring encrypted message exchange without internet access. This innovative approach prioritizes privacy, peer-to-peer interaction, and eliminates data collection, appealing to users seeking secure, surveillance-free messaging. Currently in iOS beta testing, Bitchat's high demand signals a strong interest in resilient and private communication solutions.

title: Trump's tariff war: Which 21 countries got US President's letters? Check full list
content: Donald Trump escalates trade tensions by issuing tariff letters to numerous countries, set to take effect on August 1, 2025, if trade deals aren't reached. The letters outline specific tariff rates, with some countries facing new or adjusted duties.

title: 4.4 magnitude earthquake hits Delhi-NCR; epicentre in Haryana's Jhajjar
content: A magnitude 4.4 earthquake rattled Delhi-NCR on Thursday, with tremors felt across northern India, originating from Jhajjar, Haryana, at a depth of 10 kilometers. This follows a similar quake in February, highlighting the region's seismic vulnerability. Delhi, categorized under Seismic Zone IV, faces a high risk of moderate to strong earthquakes, according to the Delhi Disaster Management Authority.

title: Bengaluru shocker: Man arrested for posting videos, photos of women without consent
content: Bengaluru police arrested 26-year-old Gurdeep Singh on Tuesday for allegedly managing an Instagram account that shared unauthorized photos and videos of women. The Banashankari police reported that Singh's account featured content captured in public areas like cafes and streets, often without the women's awareness or consent. The accused is now facing legal repercussions for violating the privacy of numerous women.

title: Gabrielle Union glows in new family photo; Dwyane Wade embraces her and daughter Kaavia
content: Gabrielle Union shared a heartwarming Instagram story featuring Dwyane Wade and their daughter Kaavia by a bonfire during a vacation. The image captured a tender family moment, with Wade holding Kaavia and gently touching Gabrielle. This simple yet powerful display of love and connection resonated with fans, highlighting the couple's enduring bond and commitment to family.

title: ‘He got tired of that BBL smell’: Cardi B slammed after deleting Stefon Diggs pics
content: Cardi B has sparked breakup rumors with Stefon Diggs by deleting all their photos together from her Instagram. Just weeks after their romantic getaways, including a stay in a French castle, fans noticed the sudden disappearance of Diggs from her social media. A cryptic post from Paris further fueled speculation, leaving fans wondering if the whirlwind romance is over.

title: Vikings rookie Dallas Turner duped in $240K bank scam; rise in sports-targeted frauds
content: Dallas Turner, the Minnesota Vikings rookie, became a victim of a bank fraud. He lost $240,000. Scammers posing as JPMorgan Chase representatives tricked him. They convinced him to transfer funds. Police are investigating the incident. This case highlights a growing trend. Professional athletes are targeted in financial crimes. Authorities are working to hold the suspects accountable.

title: Nvidia hits $4 trillion market cap: Just 5% short of India’s GDP; what's fueling the surge?
content: Nvidia's market capitalization has surpassed $4 trillion, driven by the AI sector's growth, even nearing India's GDP. The surge followed the unveiling of Comet, an AI-enhanced web browser by Perplexity AI, backed by Nvidia. This new browser aims to challenge Google Chrome's dominance in the market, offering AI-driven navigation and task execution.

title: Elon Musk reacts as Bill Gates again raises alarm on USAID funding cut killing children
content: Bill Gates expressed concerns over potential health aid cuts by the US government, warning of increased deaths. Elon Musk responded sharply, suggesting Gates' unhappiness stemmed from his organization losing US taxpayer funding. This exchange is the latest in a series of disagreements, fueled by Gates' past short position against Tesla stock, which reportedly cost him $1.5 billion.

title: Inside Jhangur Baba’s illegal 'empire': Mansion with power station, imported marble
content: In Balrampur, the district administration demolished an illegal mansion belonging to Jamaluddin alias Chhangur Baba, accused of mass religious conversions. Authorities arrested Chhangur Baba and his associate, Neetu, uncovering a network that allegedly coerced individuals into converting, particularly Hindu women. Investigations revealed foreign funding and numerous international trips, prompting a multi-agency probe into the extensive operation.

title: Frank Layden, who led Utah Jazz to first playoffs, dies at 93
content: Frank Layden, former Utah Jazz coach, passed away on Thursday. He was 93. Layden led the Jazz to their first playoffs. He won NBA Coach of the Year in 1984. He also won Executive of the Year. The Utah Jazz and NBA mourned Layden's death. They posted tributes on social media. Layden coached the Jazz from 1981 to 1989.

title: Tariff war: How US decides who pays more; Trump spells out the 'formula'
content: President Trump defended his administration's new import tariffs, citing common sense, trade deficits, and historical treatment by other countries. He announced tariffs ranging from 20 to 50 percent on several countries, including Brazil, the Philippines and others. These tariffs, part of Trump's crackdown on "non-reciprocal" trade practices, will take effect on August 1, 2025.

title: Thane school horror: Parents protest as girls stripped to check menstrual stains
content: In Thane, a shocking incident occurred at a state board school where the principal and a peon were arrested after girl students were forced to undergo physical checks to determine if they were menstruating.

title: 'Together forever': Parag Tyagi recalls memories with Shefali Jariwala
content: The entertainment industry mourns the loss of Shefali Jariwala, who passed away at 42 due to cardiac arrest. Her husband, Parag Tyagi, shared a touching video on Instagram, expressing his grief and missing her deeply. He also addressed concerns about their dog Simba, clarifying he's healthy and participating in rituals, while celebrating Shefali's loving and selfless nature.

title: IND vs ENG: Gill on the cusp of breaking multiple Bradman records; eyes also on Gavaskar, Kohli milestones
content: Shubman Gill is chasing Don Bradman's records in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, having already amassed 585 runs in two Tests. His Edgbaston performance broke records, including surpassing Virat Kohli's highest score as Indian captain.

title: Tunnel collapses in LA: 31 workers rescued; many still trapped
content: 31 workers were safely rescued from an industrial tunnel under construction in Wilmington, Los Angeles, after a partial collapse. The Los Angeles Fire Department deployed over 100 personnel, including Urban Search and Rescue teams, to the site on North Figueroa Street, the tunnel's only entry point. The tunnel, intended for wastewater, experienced the collapse several miles from the entrance.

title: AP POLYCET seat allotment result 2025 out at polycet.ap.gov.in- direct link here
content: The Department of Technical Education, Andhra Pradesh has released the AP POLYCET 2025 seat allotment results on July 10. Candidates can check their allotment status at polycet.ap.gov.in using their login credentials. Allotted students must report to their respective colleges between July 10 and 14. Classes commence immediately, and timely fee payment and document submission are mandatory.

title: Happy Guru Purnima: Images, messages, cards, greetings & pictures
content: Guru Purnima, celebrated on July 10, 2025, honors teachers and mentors across Hinduism, Buddhism, and Jainism. The day commemorates sage Vyasa's birth and Buddha's first sermon, emphasizing respect, gratitude, and spiritual insight. It provides quotes, wishes, and images to express appreciation to gurus, acknowledging their wisdom and guidance in shaping lives.

title: US vs Brazil: Trump slaps 50% tariff; President Lula hits back, says 'will not accept tutelage'
content: Brazil has warned of retaliation after the US imposed a 50% tariff on its copper imports, a move linked to Trump's support for Bolsonaro. President Lula da Silva criticized the tariff and the US embassy's defense of Bolsonaro, calling it interference. Trump cited national security for the tariff, while Brazil summoned the US ambassador to protest the embassy's statement.

title: 'I am judo-karate champion': Sena MLA assaults staff, canteen license suspended
content: Shiv Sena MLA Sanjay Gaikwad assaulted canteen staff at the Akashwani MLAs' hostel in Mumbai after being served substandard food. A video showed Gaikwad hitting a staffer after complaining about the "rotten" dal and rice. Gaikwad justified his actions, citing repeated complaints and invoking Balasaheb Thackeray's teachings. While MLAs condemned the assault, many acknowledged the poor quality of canteen food.

title: Arjun Bijlani gives a glimpse into Sangeeta Bijlani’s lavish birthday bash
content: Arjun Bijlani shared glimpses of Sangeeta Bijlani's 65th birthday celebration on Instagram, which was attended by Salman Khan amidst tight security. Arjun expressed his heartfelt wishes for Sangeeta and enjoyed spending time with Salman Khan. Fans praised Salman's presence and respectful behavior towards his ex-girlfriend, Sangeeta, highlighting their enduring friendship.

title: Who is Benjamin Hanil Song; ex-marine corp accused of shooting police officers in Texas
content: Federal authorities are actively searching for Benjamin Hanil Song, accused of a central role in an "ambush" at an ICE detention facility in Alvarado, Texas, on July 4. Song allegedly fired upon law enforcement officers with AR-15-style rifles from a concealed position.

title: Sri Lanka approach BCCI for limited-overs series after Bangladesh tour gets cancelled
content: Sri Lanka Cricket has proposed a six-match white-ball series against India in August 2025, following the postponement of India's tour to Bangladesh. The BCCI is evaluating the proposal, considering the Asia Cup schedule and consulting with players and coaches, including discussions during the Lord's Test.

title: UP DElEd result 2025 released at btcexam.in: Direct link to download scorecards here
content: The Uttar Pradesh Examination Regulatory Authority has released the UP DElEd 2025 results for the 2nd and 4th semesters across multiple batches. For the 2023 batch, the 2nd semester pass rate stood at 64%, with over 57,000 candidates failing. Results are available on btcexam.in and updeled.gov.in. Students are advised to verify and download their mark sheets online.

title: IAF Jaguar crash: Fighter pilot Lokender Singh leaves behind month-old son; family in shock
content: Squadron Leader Lokender Singh, an Indian Air Force pilot, tragically died in a Jaguar aircraft crash in Rajasthan. The 33-year-old officer, commissioned in 2016, had become a father just a month prior to the accident. He hailed from Rohtak, Haryana, and was remembered as a bright and dedicated individual who completed his training at the NDA.

title: Bihar SIR shows urban-rural divide; Aadhaar accepted in Patna, not in Seemanchal
content: Bihar's electoral roll revision reveals an urban-rural divide as 57% of voters submit forms. Patna accepts Aadhaar, while rural areas demand birth, caste, or land documents, causing distress. Many lack required papers, especially in Seemanchal, leading to document application surges and concerns about voter list retention, particularly among the elderly and those displaced by floods.

title: Neena Gupta breaks silence on first husband, says real love never felt like movies
content: Neena Gupta reminisced about her early romances. Her first love was an IIT student, whom she married. College friends were jealous of her modern outlook. A movie date plan went awry due to parental restrictions. Neena reflected on never experiencing the cinematic kind of love. She admitted to falling madly for someone, but a relationship was impossible.

title: Kapil Sharma Show: Vijay Verma and Jitendra Kumar open open up on career
content: The Great Indian Kapil Show's upcoming episode promises a laughter riot with OTT stars Jaideep Ahlawat, Vijay Varma, Jitendra Kumar, and Pratik Gandhi. They share inspiring stories of their struggles and breakthroughs, from engineering backgrounds to chasing acting dreams. Sunil Grover adds humor with his success guide, and a surprise appearance by Korean superstar Jackson Wang elevates the entertainment.

title: Rishabh Pant could make history at Lord’s – Here’s what to watch for
content: Rishabh Pant is on the cusp of breaking Virender Sehwag's record for most sixes by an Indian in Test cricket. Needing just five more sixes, Pant could achieve this milestone in the upcoming Lord's Test against England. His rapid ascent to this point is remarkable, considering he's played significantly fewer matches than Sehwag and Rohit Sharma.

title: Our border is with Tibet, not China: Arunachal CM takes swipe at Beijing
content: Arunachal Pradesh Chief Minister Pema Khandu asserted that the state shares a border with Tibet, not China, amidst Beijing's territorial claims. He highlighted China's dam project on the Yarlung Tsangpo (Brahmaputra), terming it an existential threat due to potential devastating water release.

title: Top stocks to buy or sell: Stock recommendations for July 10 - check list
content: Top stock market recommendations: Aakash K Hindocha suggests a positive outlook for Nifty and Bank Nifty, anticipating upward movement with key support levels. Voltas is poised for an 8-10% rally after breaking a 3-month consolidation. Samvardhana Motherson International shows bullish patterns, targeting gains above 160, while JK Tyre is set for a 9-11% rally following a confirmed breakout.

title: Tourism in J&K ‘bouncing back’, says CM Omar Abdullah
content: ‘...After the Pahalgam attack, tourism is bouncing back in J&K. There is a message of hope,” Omar Abdullah said.

title: Congress in Kerala scrambles to stay clear of Shashi Tharoor’s controversial article on Emergency
content: In the article, Shashi Tharoor dwells on ‘human rights abuses, including torture in detention and extra-judicial killings’ which marked the period. The Congress MP appears to place the blame for the excesses on Indira Gandhi and Sanjay Gandhi

title: 7.5 km stormwater drain connecting three lakes planned to prevent inundation
content: The plans to develop 7.5 kilometre drain connecting the lakes of Masab Cheruvu, Dilavar Khan Cheruvu and Pedda Amberpet Cheruvu were revealed by HYDRAA commissioner

title: ECI protest case: Delhi court discharges Trinamool Congress leaders Derek O'Brien, Sagarika Ghose, others
content: Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate Neha Mittal passed the order of discharge. A detailed order is awaited

title: ECI has no jurisdiction to determine questions of citizenship, petitioners tell SC
content: The petitioners have urged the top court to seek an explanation from the Election Commission for the “ill-timed and hasty” conduct of the SIR exercise in Bihar

title: Jamshedpur on alert as Kharkhai, Swarnarekha rivers cross danger mark following heavy rains
content: The East Singhbhum district administration appealed to people living near the rivers to remain alert. Schools across the district remained shut

title: Vadodara bridge collapse: BJP leadership busy in speeches, says Congress
content: Three years ago it was said that the situation was "dangerous" due to "vibrations" in the bridge but still nothing was done, Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge said

title: Watch | In a first for Tamil Nadu, 120 low-floor electric buses launched in Chennai
content: Chief Minister M.K. Stalin flagged off 120 new e-buses at Vyasarpadi depot. These accessible, non-air-conditioned buses offer ramps for wheelchair users, CCTV cameras, charging ports, emergency alarms, and real-time stop displays.

title: Karnataka to have dedicated Revenue Recovery Units in each district to implement RERA and civil court orders
content: The non-implementation of revenue recovery orders has essentially robbed RERA-K of the bite it legally has

title: Next Dalai Lama from free democratic country, not from China: Arunachal Pradesh CM Pema Khandu
content: Pema Khandu said the process of selecting the next Dalai Lama starts only after an incumbent passes away and hoped and prayed the 14th Dalai Lama will live for another 40 years

title: ED raid on Congress MLA S.N. Subba Reddy in Karnataka
content: The raids were connected to allegations of undisclosed foreign assets held by Mr. Reddy and his family members

title: Double honour for Kasaragod district in Kerala State Biodiversity Conservation awards
content: Kasaragod District Panchayat Biodiversity Management Committee named Best Biodiversity Management Committee and Government Fisheries HSS Bekal recognised as Best Green School

title: Indian team to soon visit Washington again for trade talks with U.S.: Official
content: The official said that negotiations will happen on both interim and the first phase of the bilateral trade agreement (BTA) during this visit

title: PM Modi can now find time to visit Manipur, review why Pahalgam terrorists not brought to justice: Congress
content: The Opposition party called on the Prime Minister to chair an all-party meeting to firm up the agenda for the forthcoming Monsoon session of Parliament

title: My harsh action spurred long-awaited response: Maharashtra MLA Gaikwad on slap row
content: The legislator from Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena acknowledged his behaviour may have appeared inappropriate, but maintained that it ultimately served a public purpose

title: Traffic snarls on Edapally-Paliekkara NH corridor: Kerala HC warns NHAI of halting toll collection
content: Court says motorists who pay toll had a right to commute through the NH corridor without encountering traffic snarls and potholes

title: Bengaluru man arrested for posting voyeuristic videos of women on Instagram
content: While the accused, Gurdeep Singh, is said to have deleted all the posts from the Instagram page before the police arrested him, the phone has sent for forensic analysis.

title: Supreme Court posts plea on July 14 seeking government help to save Nimisha Priya awaiting execution in Yemen
content: The execution of Ms. Nimisha Priya is reportedly scheduled on July 16; Directs petitioner organisation to serve advance copy of their petition to the AG office for possible early diplomatic interventions

title: Himachal Pradesh monsoon havoc death toll reaches 85
content: 54 fatalities were directly caused by rain-related incidents such as landslides, flash floods, and cloudbursts, while 31 deaths were reported from road accidents, as per the SDMA

title: Gurugram receives 133 mm rainfall in 12 hours, ‘work from home’ advisory issued to private firms
content: Gurugram faces chaos after intense rainfall causing waterlogging, power outages and traffic jams, prompting the authorities to issue work-from-home advisory; IMD issues orange alert

title: Actors, anchors, TV hosts among 29 booked by ED for promoting illegal betting apps
content: The case revolves around paid promotions for platforms such as Junglee Rummy, A23, JeetWin, Parimatch, Lotus365, and others suspected to be involved in large-scale money laundering

title: BJP takes dig at Arvind Kejriwal over his Nobel Prize claim; AAP says focus on work instead of ‘name-calling’
content: Virendra Sachdeva took a dig at Mr. Kejriwal, saying he would have surely received a Nobel Prize if there were categories for "incompetence, anarchy and corruption"

title: Pawan Kalyan greets PM Modi on receiving highest civilian honours of Brazil, Ghana and Namibia
content: ‘This rare achievement stands as a proud moment for every Indian and a testament to the Prime Minister’s exemplary statesmanship and diplomatic skills,’ says Andhra Pradesh Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan.

title: Pawan Kalyan gifts ₹1 lakh to student who made battery-powered bicycle
content: Rajapu Sidhu, an Intermediate student, claimed that the bicycle has a range of 80 km for a three-hour battery charge.

title: Girls made to strip for menstruation check: Thane school principal, another staffer arrested
content: As per the complaint lodged by a parent of one of the students, the girls were called to the school's convention hall and shown photos of blood stains in the toilet and floor by screening them through a projector

title: Amarnath Yatra: 7,307 pilgrims leave Jammu base camp
content: About 1.28 lakh pilgrims have paid obeisance at the holy cave shrine, located at a height of 3,880 metres, since the commencement of the 38-day annual yatra

title: Vadodara bridge collapse: Death toll rises to 15 as search continues
content: Following directives from Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel, a high-level technical team from the Roads and Buildings Department reached early morning to conduct a thorough investigation

title: About Grok 4: Elon Musk's New Chatbot That's "Smarter Than All Graduates"
content: Tech billionaire Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI on Wednesday unveiled Grok 4, its latest AI model.

title: "Lamborghini With Alto Wheels": Kerala Man Builds Supercar With Spare Parts
content: Bibin, a 26-year-old quality assurance professional from Kerala, built his scrap-made Lamborghini Huracan. He mentioned that his Lamborghini Huracan sits on Maruti Suzuki Alto wheels and is powered by the same engine.

title: Japan's Kansai Airport, Praised For Its Engineering Marvel, Is Now Sinking
content: The Kansai International Airport (KIX) in Japan, built on two artificial islands in Osaka Bay, was once hailed as an engineering marvel. It is currently sinking.

title: "Snatch Their Cameras": Journalists Roughed Up At MDMK Chief Vaiko's Event In Tamil Nadu
content: Journalists covering an MDMK meeting in Virudhunagar district of Tamil Nadu were roughed up by party workers on Wednesday, after veteran leader and party chief Vaiko lashed out at mediapersons for filming empty chairs during the event.

title: Vijay Deverakonda, Rana Daggubati Among 29 South Celebs Facing Probe Agency ED Heat
content: South stars Vijay Deverakonda and Rana Daggubati are among 29 celebrities against whom the Enforcement Directorate (ED) has filed a case for endorsing betting apps.

title: Video: Gurugram Road Caves In After Heavy Rain, Truck Falls Into Giant Crater
content: A massive crater swallowed a truck in Gurugram late Wednesday night after an intense spell of rain caused a portion of the road to collapse, severely impacting traffic.

title: "Later Downplayed As... ": Shashi Tharoor's Emergency Barb At Congress
content: Senior Congress leader Shashi Tharoor has said that the Emergency should not be remembered merely as a dark chapter in India's history, but that its lessons must be fully understood.

title: Shashi Tharoor's Sanjay Gandhi Flashback Post In New Provocation For Congress
content: In another move that is likely to widen his rift with the Congress leadership, senior party leader Shashi Tharoor has written an article on the Emergency imposed by the Indira Gandhi government in 1975.

title: "They Are Defaming Maharashtra": Sena MLA Who Slapped Man Over Stale Food
content: Marathis would have never shown any laxity in serving fresh food if they were allowed to run the canteen at the MLAs hostel in Mumbai, Shiv Sena MLA Sanjay Gaikwad has said, after he assaulted a staff member for allegedly serving him stale food.

title: Gujarat Bridge Collapse Death Count Now 15, Rescue Teams Tackle 3-Metre Mud
content: The death count in the Gambhira bridge collapse in Gujarat's Vadodara district has climbed to 15, and three people are still missing. Disaster response teams are conducting the rescue operation and two more vehicles are likely in the river.

title: Delhi Man Stabbed To Death Over Rs 2,000 Loan Dispute
content: A 23-year-old man was stabbed to death allegedly by a local resident in northeast Delhi's Jafrabad area following a dispute over a Rs 2,000 loan, an official said on Thursday.

title: Outrage After Instagram Account Posts Videos Of Bengaluru Women Without Consent
content: A young girl has taken to Instagram to flag concerns over an account that has been posting reels of women without their consent as they walk on Church Street and other parts of Bengaluru.

title: Puducherry In Deadlock As Chief Minister Boycotts Work Over Lt Governor's Overreach
content: Chief Minister of Union Territory of Puducherry N Rangasamy and ministers from the ruling All India N R Congress skipped work for the third consecutive day, intensifying their protest against Lt Governor Kuniyil Kailashnathan's alleged overreach.

title: "Helpless, Humiliated": Indian Tourist Says Spent 3 Days In Russia Detention
content: At least nine Indian tourists allegedly met with "inhuman" treatment in Russia after they were detained upon arrival in Moscow.

title: Chinese Man, Son Caught Stealing Neptune Missile Secrets In Ukraine
content: Ukraine has arrested a Chinese father and son suspected of attempting to steal classified technology related to its Neptune missile programme.

title: CCTV Shows Man Slapping, Biting 12-Year-Old For Not Holding Lift Door Open
content: In a deeply disturbing incident from Maharashtra's Thane district, a 12-year-old boy was brutally attacked by a man inside a residential building lift, where the child was slapped multiple times and bitten on the hand during the unprovoked assault.

title: Probe Agency ED Raids Congress MLA Subba Reddy's Properties In Bengaluru
content: The Directorate of Enforcement (ED) was conducting raids on the residence and properties of three-time Congress MLA S.N. Subba Reddy in Bengaluru on Thursday.

title: Gurugram Offices Advised To Take Work From Home Amid Heavy Rain Today
content: Due to the heavy rain, all corporate offices and private institutions in the Gurugram district have been advised to guide their employee to work from home on Thursday, July 10, so that traffic congestion can be avoided.

title: Maharashtra Special Public Security Bill 2024 Tabled To Tackle "Urban Naxalism"
content: Maharashtra Revenue Minister Chandrashekhar Bawankule on Thursday presented the report of the Joint Committee on the Special Public Security Bill 2024 in the Assembly, which is aimed at curbing "urban Naxalism".

title: How Happy Pasia Made It Big In World Of Crime, Became Khalistani Terrorist
content: Harpreet Singh, alias Happy Pasia, smuggled liquor in his younger days, but his ambitions knew no bounds. Aspiring to make it big in the criminal world, he befriended the world's worst, including terrorists and gangsters.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal submit bid for Chelsea's Noni Madueke
content: Arsenal have made an initial offer for Chelsea's Noni Madueke. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Euro 2025 Daily: France cruise past Wales, England bounce back
content: France are on course to qualify to the next round, whereas England bounce back against an always tricky Dutch side. Here's everything you need to know about Euro 2025 action.

title: Crisis, what crisis? England thrash Netherlands to keep Euro 2025 dream alive
content: Cancel the obituaries, England are alive and well at Euro 2025 after thrashing Netherlands in Zurich.

title: Ranking all 32 NFL teams based on WR, RB and TE talent: Who's No. 1? Who's No. 32?
content: Which teams have the best skill position talent around their quarterback? We stacked all 32 from worst to first.

title: Inside the shift in evaluating MLB draft catching prospects
content: MLB's 2023 rules changes are influencing how the position is taught, played, coached, scouted at all levels.

title: Odisha tops DMF collections in India with ₹31,324 Crore
content: DMF, which was introduced through Mines and Mineral (Development and Regulation) (MMDR) Amendment Act 2015, for benefiting people in mining affected region marks completion of 10 years this year

title: AHAR asks Maharashtra Govt. to roll back tax hikes
content: According to AHAR these taxes will have far-reaching consequences as the hospitality industry in Maharashtra has over 19,000 legal permit rooms and lounge bars and the number growing by 8% annually.

title: Bihar voter list row hearing LIVE: SIR exercise a ploy for citizenship screening, petitioners tell SC
content: The petitioners have urged the top court to seek an explanation from the Election Commission for the “ill-timed and hasty” conduct of the SIR exercise in Bihar

title: Odisha police releases 25 suspected foreign nationals
content: Suspected foreign nationals are being treated with dignity, accommodated on a college premises, not in any detention centre, says Jharsuguda BJP Tankadhar Tripathy

title: Madhav takes over as Andhra Pradesh BJP president, vows to carry forward party’s legacy
content: He demands renaming the Lenin Centre in Vijayawada after ‘local icon’ and Telugu poet Viswanatha Satyanarayana

title: Strike brings life to a standstill in Kozhikode district
content: Protesters forcibly close several shops, offices and commercial establishments apart from interrupting public transport

title: General strike disrupts normal life in Ernakulam
content: Shops, commercial establishments remain closed; public transport affected as private buses stay off road; Kochi metro operates services as usual

title: India's advanced artillery gun system exemplary mission mode success: Defence Ministry
content: The key features are its quite advance system, he said, adding, ARDE is playing a crucial rule in “Atmanirbharta of our nation”

title: Maharashtra FDA suspends MLA hostel caterer's licence after 'stale food' claim by Legislator
content: The violations were found during an inspection conducted at the hostel earlier in the day, said the regulator

title: Mandi cloudbursts: Pet dog saved 60 lives in Himachal village by ‘howling loudly’ amid flash floods, landslide
content: Fifteen people died and five were injured while a search is on to trace the 27 people who went missing after 10 cloudbursts, followed by flash floods and landslide in Mandi

title: It is for govt to decide whether degree in physiotherapy equivalent to MBBS: Allahabad HC
content: A commission concluded that a bachelor's degree in physiotherapy would not count as a degree in medicine or medical science, a requisite qualification for the post of food safety officer

title: Sutlej-Yamuna Link canal issue: Impasse continues as meeting remains inconclusive
content: Punjab CM Mann reiterated that the state has no spare water to share with any other state and there is no question of sharing even a single drop of water with anyone.

title: Not opposed to legal rice exports, but black market of PDS rice will not be tolerated, says Civil Supplies Minister Nadendla Manohar
content: He also asked the Civil Supplies Vigilance and Enforcement officials to intensify field inspections and directed the authorities to consider additional checkpoints along the National Highways where needed.

title: Govt. striving to bring State back on tracks after suffering five years of damage, says Minister
content: The previous government put a stop to 450 of the 1,040 lift irrigation schemes running till 2019, and due to this, water did not reach 4 lakh acres, the Minister said.

title: Green Tax slashed in Andhra Pradesh; ₹275 crore support for mango and cocoa farmers
content: The government will procure 2,976.76 tonnes of cocoa beans at ₹50 a kg; ₹260 crore allocated for procurement of 6.5 lakh tonnes of Totapuri mangoes

title: Odisha introduces academic accountability in schools through examinations
content: Class V, VIII students will be given additional opportunities to clear their examination and get promoted to next class and if they fail, they will have to continue in same class

title: Mamata writes to NITI Aayog Chairperson as a report on West Bengal shows map of Bihar
content: The CM said this was a “grave lapse in mapping West Bengal” and voiced her “unequivocal disapproval” for the misrepresentation

title: RG Kar rape and murder case: Sealdah court rejects victim’s kin’s plea to revisit crime scene
content: The victim’s parents have alleged that the CBI did not properly look into the findings of the forensic reports, particularly pertaining to the scene of crime and the collected DNA evidence.

title: APMDC bond issue: Andhra Pradesh CM orders probe into ‘email conspiracy’
content: The Chief Minister pulls up Ministers for lacklustre performance, saying that any complacency in this regard will not be tolerated

title: Guided by sound, not sight: How a Hyderabad centre is redefining possibilities for the visually impaired
content: The institute also operates a dedicated helpline to support visually impaired individuals seeking assistance for a range of needs, from mobility issues and accessing essential services to navigating everyday challenges.

title: CPI(M) demands refund of ‘excess power charges’ of ₹2,787 crore collected in Andhra Pradesh
content: Energy Minister Gottipati Ravi Kumar has been urged to clear the air on the colelction of additional ₹0.40 per unit every month as FPPCA charges

title: Alert train driver averts accident in Sealdah division
content: As part of the July 9 general strike called by some trade unions, protesters blocked Deula-Magrahat railway line with sleepers

title: Women scheme workers take lead in ‘Bharat Bandh’ protests in Haryana; workers, farmers and construction labourers also join
content: Speaking at separate meetings in Rohtak and Nuh, All India Kisan Sabha national vice-president Inderjit Singh and trade union leader Jai Bhagwan said the scale of the strike should serve as a wake-up call for the government to withdraw the “draconian” labour codes without delay.

title: Revised Maharashtra special public security Bill likely to be tabled in Assembly today
content: Draft legislation aims at curbing ‘left-wing extremist organisations’ in State; Bill introduced last year was referred to joint select committee for scrutiny; panel’s report agreed upon unanimously, according to officials

title: Apollo Hospitals launches nutrition guide to promote preventive health
content: The book offers dietary guidelines, immune-boosting tips, and recovery plans, with easy recipes and nutritional breakdowns with photographs

title: There is a quiet and visible crisis in higher education in India that runs deep: Deepak Nayyar
content: The future of public universities in India is at a grave risk, if not already over the edge of the precipice, the eminent academician and former Chief Economic Advisor said in his B.G. Deshmukh Lecture on ‘The Crisis of Higher Education in India: Disturbing Present and Worrisome Future’

title: Historic Kotwal House revived
content: Originally serving as the Hyderabad police commissioner’s office between 1920 and 2002, the Purani Haveli building fell into disrepair and was considered for demolition after a roof collapse four years ago

title: Land acquisition takes off for Chennai’s second airport at Parandur
content: 19 landowners from five villages have agreed to the land acquisition; Parandur Airport Project Protestors Committee alleges that the government coerced some landowners into registering their land for the project

title: End custodial brutality, begin criminal justice reform
content: India is failing its citizens and its police force by investing in enforcement without investing in reform

title: Minister Duraimurugan inaugurates built at a cost of ₹24.82 crore dyke across Palar near Katpadi
content: Officials said the new structure at Arumparuthi village was among the five dykes built across the Palar river at Katpadi and Gudiyatham taluk and its tributary, Malataru, in Vellore

title: Speed up land re-survey works in Eluru district: Joint Collector
content: The Joint Collector instructed officials to prioritise boundary surveys of villages, mandals, and inter-state borders and to ensure the entire re-survey process is completed within the prescribed schedule

title: ‘Those acting against nation must be in jail till trial ends’: Solicitor General to Delhi HC on bail petitions of accused in Delhi 2020 riots case
content: ‘Long incarceration can’t be used to seek relief’, said SG to HC Bench hearing bail pleas of Umar, Sharjeel, others in 2020 riots ‘larger conspiracy’ case; both sides conclude arguments; court reserves verdict

title: No decision yet on NPR updation during Census, say Home Ministry officials
content: Census directors told to await final decision; August-September 2025 pre-test will only include questions on household amenities; no test questionnaire on second phase, which includes caste data

title: Hyderabad Cricket Association president, four others held by CID over IPL ticketing irregularities
content: Their arrests follow a report submitted by the Vigilance and Enforcement Wing to State government, detailing suspected lapses in governance and ticket allocation by the association during  IPL

title: India’s goal in Africa is to ‘build together’, PM says in Namibia
content: India seeks to cooperate, not compete with Africa, says Mr. Modi; says Africa should not just be raw material source, but lead in value creation, sustainable growth; PM conferred Namibia’s highest civilian honour

title: Woman who died in quarantine tests negative for Nipah in Kerala
content: Central team arrives in Kerala on Wednesday to visit the Nipah-affected areas in two northern districts and coordinate preventive efforts

title: A'ja Wilson, Josh Allen among 2025 ESPYS candidates; vote now
content: the 2025 ESPYS presented by Capital One are July 16 . the Oklahoma City Thunder guard is nominated in two categories: Best Athlete - Men's Sports, and Best NBA Player . Simone Biles and Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone are up for best . Ilona Maher and Ezra Frech represent in both categories .

title: Final 2025 MLB draft rankings: Which college ace is No. 1 in our top 250 prospects?
content: I've updated my overall minor league top 100 rankings to make adjustments and remove graduated players so you can see roughly where the top players in the draft would slot on that list . this year's class is highlighted by a group of college left-handed pitchers near the top of the rankings .

title: Michael Jordan's former Chicago-area estate listed on Airbnb
content: the home, which sold for $9.5 million in December, became available for rental on Airbnb this month . the two-story estate, which was built in 1995, has seven bedrooms and 17.5 bathrooms . it features a full-size basketball court, putting green, tennis court, cigar room and infinity pool .

title: Washington Commanders unveil alternate uniforms for 2025-26 NFL season
content: the team's alternate jerseys, unveiled on friday, stay true to that sentiment . the commanders will return their uniforms to their style before they changed their name and redesigned the jerseys for 2022 . they will wear the former burgundy-and-gold look three times this season .

title: Reese, Anthony join Gilgeous-Alexander as NBA 2K26 cover stars, release date announced
content: the NBA 2K26 Standard Edition will be available on PC, PS4, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S . the other editions come with advanced access, allowing owners to dive in as early as Aug. 29 . all three athletes stand together on the Leave No Doubt Edition's cover .

title: USMNT striker Downs seals move to Southampton
content: Damion Downs joins Southampton from FC Cologne on a four-year deal . the 21-year-old striker scored 10 goals and set up five more to help Cologne to promotion . downs will host high-profile Wrexham in opening game of second-tier championship .

title: Big 12 pool of draftable quarterbacks runs deep
content: one scout estimates there are more than a dozen college quarterbacks . a third says it's safe to project a "very good year" for quarterbacks in the 2026 draft class . quarterbacks have draftable grades for 2026, double what it normally is .

title: 'To New York': Chelsea clap back at Flamengo after reaching Club World Cup final
content: Joo Pedro scores two goals against his former club Fluminense . the brazilian side beat Chelsea 3-1 in the club world cup semifinals . a post with the score graphic and the caption "Easy win against London Blue!" went viral .

title: Yankees DFA LeMahieu after 'hard conversations'
content: two-time batting champion DJ leMahieu was owed $22 million through next season . the move resulted from "an evolving conversation," manager Aaron Boone explained . it comes a day after Boone announced that jazz Chisholm Jr .

title: Who dropped out of the top 10? Players eyeing a bounce-back at RB, DT and edge
content: sportsmail's survey of the top 10 players at every position is unveiled . we compiled the results and ranked candidates based on number of top-10 votes, composite average and interviews . more than 70 voters submitted a ballot on at least one position .

title: PSG dominate Real Madrid to reach Club World Cup final
content: Take a look at the best stats from PSG's incredible 4-0 win over Real Madrid in the Club World Cup semifinals. (1:16) The stage is set for Sunday's  Club World Cup  final:  Paris Saint-Germain  will take on  Chelsea  after brushing aside  Real Madrid   4-0  in Wednesday's semifinal. Relive all the action from MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey, with ESPN. Jump to:   Club World Cup home page  |  Liveblog

title: ❤️ Tim Tebow and wife welcome their first child
content: daphne Reign Tebow's middle name is inspired by a young girl they admire . "we couldn't be more grateful for the blessing and gift of this new little life," he wrote . the couple announced the birth of their daughter in a joint Instagram post .

title: West: Should Minnesota, Houston or any West team scare OKC?
content: Oklahoma City's 2025-26 Eastern Conference race looks wide open due to star injuries . a mass of hopeful contenders must chase down the champion Oklahoma City Thunder . which veteran-laden teams hope to stay sufficiently spry for another deep playoff run?

title: From A+ to D+: Grading NHL offseasons
content: the compressed offseason is an opportunity for every front office to improve its roster . some general managers need just a few players to remain a top Stanley Cup contender . others need to be a bit more aggressive to raise their club's competitive level .

title: Big questions: How can NFL players try out for national teams?
content: flag football is enjoying massive growth in the united states and around the world . the inclusion of flag football in the 2028 summer games could take the sport to unprecedented heights . "it's an incredible honor for any athlete to represent their country in the Olympics," NFL commissioner says .

title: NHL free agency tracker: Updated list of the summer signings
content: a slew of re-signings and the trade of Mitch Marner took several big names off the free agent big board . the 2025 draft included 224 prospects finding new homes, and the weekend included trades for Noah Dobson , Charlie Coyle and John Gibson .
